verbs.description: [V: Ripping] [ARG1: the Trump administration 's policy of separating families at the border] [ARG2: as ' immoral] , ' [ARG0: Massachusetts Attorney General Maura Healey] signed on to a letter with 21 of her colleagues demanding an immediate end to the practice .

Ripping the Trump administration 's policy of [V: separating] [ARG1: families] [ARGM-LOC: at the border] as ' immoral , ' Massachusetts Attorney General Maura Healey signed on to a letter with 21 of her colleagues demanding an immediate end to the practice .
